title: The palis of honoure compyled by Gawayne dowglas Byshope of Dunkyll
author: Douglas, Gawin, 1474?-1522.
publisher: In fletstret, at the sygne of the Rose garland by wyllyam Copland,
notes: Running title reads: The palys of honour.
The title with "Honoure Compyled" is the third, corrected state of the title page. State 1: title page has "Honour Compyeled"; state 2: erroneously corrected to "Honoure Compeled".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
